usas adhyapana amathi es.bi. disanayaka mahathage yojanawak matha me wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana athara pradhana ansha 9 k yatathe kriya kere.shishya thorathuru saha adhyapana modiyulaya, manawa sampath kalamanakarana modiyulaya, sapayum saha pahasukam modiyulaya, ginum saha mudal modiyulaya, bhanda lekhana/ thoga lekhana palana modiyulaya, sthawara wathkam modiyulaya, padi layisthu/watup modiyulaya, pusthakala kalamanakarana modiyulaya, shishya aathmarakshaka modiyulaya yana ansha yatathe daththa gatha kirima sidu kere.me wana wita wishwawidyala kihipayakatama hadunwa di thibena mema thorathuru kalamanakarana paddhathiya itha ikmanin kriyathmaka matmatama path kirimata katayuthu kara thibena bawa amathyanshaye athireka lekam pi.ji. jayasinha mahatha pawasayi.me anuwa wishwawidyala paripalana katayuthu, adhyayana ha anadhyayana katayuthu siyalla karyakshamawath shishya, aacharya, paripalana ha sewaka siyallange pahasuwenuth wancha saha dushanawalin thorawath sidu kirimata hakiyawa labena bawath ee mahatha kiyayi.
